data.title: S2E27: Be Where Your | 八寶網路廣播
data.meta_description: This week we are joined by Sebastian Arcelus and our own Stephanie J. Block. Sebastian Arcelus is known for his roles as Lucas Goodwin in the Netflix series HOUSE OF CARDS and Jay Whitman in the CBS series MADAM SECRETARY.  His Broadway credits include ELF, JERSEY BOYS, WICKED, & RENT.  He is now starring as The Baker in INTO THE WOODS. In this weeks episode, Broadway's The Baker and The Baker's Wife discuss bringing a 15-year marriage into their storytelling, getting notes to stop touching each other, the blessing of not sharing a dressing room, and finding the fairytale in new ways, every single performance.  Into The Woods It Takes Two  Bag Balm Support the show: http://www.stagespodcast.net
data.text: This week we are joined by Sebastian Arcelus and our own Stephanie J. Block. Sebastian Arcelus is known for his roles as Lucas Goodwin in the Netflix series HOUSE OF CARDS and Jay Whitman in the CBS series MADAM SECRETARY. His Broadway credits include ELF, JERSEY BOYS, WICKED, & RENT. He is now starring as The Baker in INTO THE WOODS. In this weeks episode, Broadway's The Baker and The Baker's Wife discuss bringing a 15-year marriage into their storytelling, getting notes to stop touching each other, the blessing of not sharing a dressing room, and finding the fairytale in new ways, every single performance. Into The Woods It Takes Two Bag Balm Support the show: http://www.stagespodcast.net
